column1: English Sent: The peninsular plateau is composed of igneous and metamorphic rocks with gently rising hills and wide valleys.
Hindi Tansl: prAyaxvIpIya_paTAra Agneya waWA rUpAMwariwa SEloM vAlI kama UzcI pahAdZiyoM evaM cOdZI GAtiyoM se banA hE.
Anu Translation:  prAyaxvIpIya paTAra se naramI se pahAdiyAz Ora vyApaka GAtiyAz Upara uTanA agni sambanXI Ora metamoVrPika cattAnoM kA racA gayA hE
K##-#prAyaxvIpIya paTAra#--#racA gayA hE#-#agni sambanXI#Ora#metamoVrPika#cattAnoM kA#se#naramI se#Upara uTanA#pahAdiyAz#Ora#vyApaka#GAtiyAz
